original_text: Whoever is caught with the devoted things shall be destroyed by fire, along with all that belongs to him. He has violated the covenant of the Lord and has done an outrageous thing in Israel!’”
korean_text: 온전히 바친 물건을 가진 자로 뽑힌 자를 불사르되 그와 그의 모든 소유를 그리하라 이는 여호와의 언약을 어기고 이스라엘 가운데에서 망령된 일을 행하였음이라 하셨다 하라

sentences.original_text: Whoever is caught with the devoted things
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께 바친 물건을 가진 자가 붙잡히면

sentences.original_text: along with all that belongs to him
He has violated the covenant of the Lord
and has done an outrageous thing in Israel
